page.title: 06Games at Home.
page.content: There are lots of games children play after school.Most children like to play on their bikes in the streets and lanes of the village.Some people have a home computer and play Donkey Kong, Hopper, Boxer and other games. Children also play outside.They play games such as Football, Tennis and "Horses." Horses is played like this.One person is an owner , another a horse.They act as if they own a real horse and have paddocks and sometimes use people to act as thieves.A popular game is "Blockie" where one child is "it" and the rest run off and hide. The first child looks around and tries to find them.When he sees one he runs to the "blockie" post and says "Blockie 1,2,3.-you're out".When everyone is"blocked" the first to be caught is "it" and the game continues.
